title: Instructional Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Effective Utilization of Reusable e-Learning Objects (ELO)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic e-learning development processes and LMS (Learning Management System) operational experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the definition of ELOs and conditions for enhancing their reusability.
Learners can systematically classify ELOs by applying a metadata tagging system.
Learners can apply methods for designing customized courses through ELO combinations in database-driven LMS environments.
Learners can develop ELO templates suitable for vocational training in social fields.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
